summary:
Results-driven Senior Java Backend Developer with 9+ years of expertise in enterprise software architecture and Spring Boot microservices development. Proven track record in designing and implementing high-performance, scalable backend solutions. Core competencies include:

• Java/Spring Expertise: Advanced implementation of Spring Boot microservices and REST APIs
• Software Engineering: Clean code practices and modular architecture design
• Database Engineering: Deep expertise in SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases
• Architecture Patterns: Extensive experience with DDD, Event-Driven Design, and Layered Architecture
• Testing & Quality: Strong background in TDD using JUnit, Mockito, and Testcontainers
• Message Systems: Proficient with Apache Kafka and ActiveMQ messaging patterns
• DevOps & Cloud: Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, AWS (EC2, S3) services
• Collaboration: Strong communication skills and experience in cross-functional team environments

Key Achievements:
• Architected microservices-based payment processing platform handling $100M+ annual transactions
• Reduced system response time by 45% through microservices implementation
• Achieved 99.99% uptime for critical backend services
• Led implementation of event-driven architecture improving system scalability by 60%

workExperience.title: Senior Java Backend Developer
workExperience.description: Lead backend architect for enterprise payment processing systems, focusing on microservices architecture, scalability, and high-availability solutions.
achievements: Led backend architecture for payment processing system handling $50M+ monthly transactions with 99.99% uptime
Designed and implemented microservices architecture using Spring Boot and Spring Cloud, reducing system latency by 45%
Developed event-driven architecture using Apache Kafka for real-time transaction processing
Implemented comprehensive test coverage using JUnit 5, Mockito, and Testcontainers achieving 90% coverage
Optimized MongoDB and PostgreSQL database performance reducing query response times by 60%
Established CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Applied Domain-Driven Design principles to complex payment processing domains

workExperience.title: Senior Java Developer
workExperience.description: Developed backend services for individual pension insurance system, focusing on financial calculations and regulatory compliance.
achievements: Implemented complex pension calculation algorithms with high accuracy
Developed REST APIs for pension fund management system
Integrated regulatory compliance checks into the system
Optimized database queries for financial calculations

workExperience.description: Developed backend services for Videotron BSS telecommunications platform, focusing on scalability and performance.
achievements: Designed and implemented REST APIs serving 1M+ subscribers with 99.9% uptime

Created comprehensive test suites achieving 85% code coverage
